mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, name, gender, id_card, phone, email, address, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{idCard}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = #{username} AND password = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, id_card = #{idCard}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET avatar = #{avatar}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
